body.name: 2024 Newest Car GPS Navigator 7-inch Touch Screen Real Voice prompts Turn Direction Speed Limit Warning car GPS Satellite Navigator, Lifetime Free Update World map
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 19 mins
features: Free Lifetime Map Updates: Plug and Play! The GPS navigator for car is preloaded with the 2024 latest North American maps, which include 101 regions in the United States, Canada, and Mexico. Free lifetime map updates, only one-time purchase, lifetime enjoyment. The map can be viewed in 2D/3D mode, and the units can be changed between miles/feet/yards and kilometers/meters.

【7 INCH TOUCH SCREEN】7" TFT LCD touch screen is clear and sensitive, 800 x 480 resolution. It made by the tempered glass and high-quality sensors and has a full viewing angle and high brightness (500cd) that you can see the map clearly even under the Sun.

【Car GPS Function】①Support Postcode, Address, Coordinates, Favorite and POI Search. ②4 Routes Options: Fast/Green/Short/Easy. ③Support GPS time or Map time setting. ④Support FM broadcast, but FM not mean FM radio, just for transferring the gps sound to your car.⑤Providing Intelligent Current Speed Camera Alerts, Sound Warning, Route Planning, Street Names Broadcast, Current Speed and Active Lane Assistant, Display Remaining Distance, telling Estimated Arrival Time ( real voice announcement).

【Reliable Car GPS】: GPS for car with helpful speed warnings, speed cameras, and traffic light notifications save you money on fines. You'll never miss a turn or make a risky lane change again with Lane Assist. The navigation system in 44 languages, with clear and easy-to-understand male and female voice guiding is your dependable travel companion. Connect the navigator to the car audio through FM for louder voice instruction.

【What You Get】 ①GPS Navigation with CE & RoHs Certificate ②Car Charger ③USB Cable ④Suction Cup Mount ⑤Back Bracket ⑥User Manual. (Common questions and operates are in user manual, please read it carefully before or while you use your navigation. If you need further help, please feel free to contact us. )

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Free map update： We offer lifetime free map updates. We have pre-installed maps of Canada, the United States, Mexico, and are willing to provide maps of Europe/South America/Southeast Asia/Middle East. See the manual for more details

7 vehicle modes available： The GPS navigation system supports 7 vehicles, namely car/pedestrian/bicycle/emergency/bus/taxi/truck. You can make changes as follows, trucks, navigation - settings - route settings - vehicles - trucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This GPS is cheaply made and fails to connect with satellites. Does not have updated maps whenever it actually connects to a satellite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband & he loved it. It was easy to operate. Battery works for like an hour & a half but you can always drive with it plugged in. Has the new tech like Bluetooth for the new generation or works good with out it for our older generation. It works just fine on its own.The voice audio is loud and clear and instructs with directions at key points. He loved that the screen is big , makes it easier to see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's like dealing with a windows 97 computer. Useless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with this in-car GPS navigator. The 7-inch touch screen is easy to use and the interface is intuitive. The actual voice instructions are clear and accurate, and the turn direction and speed limit function is a valuable safety feature. I love the satellite map update feature, which ensures that I always have the latest and most accurate navigation information. Overall, this GPS navigator is an essential travel tool and an excellent purchase for any driver. recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great buy for a GPS. Comes with a unshielded and a suction holder that can go on the dash or windshield. Won't stick to the dash if it was recently wiped down w Armor All.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Perfect Travel Buddy: 2024 Newest Car GPS Navigator!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Hey fellow adventurers! I recently got my hands on the 2024 Newest Car GPS Navigator, and let me tell you, it's like having a trusty friend along for the ride! This 7-inch touchscreen wonder is not just a GPS – it's a game-changer for your road trips.Easy-Breezy User Interface (UI):Navigating couldn't be more fun with its super-friendly interface. The touchscreen is so responsive, and the menus are like a road trip guide – simple, straightforward, and easy to follow. Even if you're not the tech guru, you'll be cruising through settings and destinations like a pro.Maps that Wow:The maps on this bad boy are seriously impressive. They're like the travel guru you never knew you needed. Detailed world maps? Check. Real-time updates? Check. Turn-by-turn directions that won't confuse you? Double-check! And, oh, did I mention the speed limit warnings? Safety first, friends!Built to Last:I was pleasantly surprised by how sturdy this thing is! The 7-inch touchscreen feels like it's ready for any adventure, and the build quality screams durability. It's not just a GPS; it's a tough travel companion that can handle whatever the road throws at it. The premium look is just the cherry on top.Bang for Your Buck:Let's talk money – this GPS is an absolute steal! Lifetime free updates for world maps mean you're investing in a long-lasting friendship. Considering the awesome features, the easy-peasy UI, and the rock-solid build, you're getting way more than your money's worth.To sum it up, the 2024 Car GPS Navigator is more than just a gadget – it's your friendly sidekick on the road of life. With its cool UI, reliable maps, and rugged build, it's the kind of friend you'd invite on every road trip. Trust me, this one's a winner!
